entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
